## Quick Installation

The easiest way to install PyTennisScorer is via pip:

```bash
pip install pytennisscorer
```

## Development Installation

For development or to get the latest features:

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/talktennisdata/pytennisscorer.git
cd pytennisscorer

# Install with development dependencies using uv
uv pip install -e ".[dev]"
```

## Requirements

- Python 3.9 or higher
- No external dependencies for core functionality

## Verify Installation

```{python}
#| live: true

# Verify pytennisscorer is installed and working
import pytennisscorer

print(f"PyTennisScorer version: {pytennisscorer.__version__}")
print("Available classes:")
for item in dir(pytennisscorer):
    if not item.startswith('_'):
        print(f"  - {item}")
```

## Browser Usage

No installation needed! This documentation includes PyTennisScorer pre-loaded in your browser via Pyodide. All code examples are editable and runnable.
